column4: hi dudes.. i have a  video 1920 x 1080 and i want to resize it to something lower. i put in ffmpeg  ffmpeg -i video.mp4 -s xga -vcodec copy paparia.mp4 and the result is 1920 x 1080. . what can i do ? i want to resize it
there are loads of video size options for ffmpeg. Take a look at the ffmpeg man page
but i put the -s xga option and nothing happends
Hmmmm.... your syntax seems legit. Sorry, I can't help on this one
